transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ji good morning Numan baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Ji mam ji sir good morning.
Executive: Mam Numan baat kar raha tha India Mart se.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Numan baat kar raha tha India Mart se.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji sir bataiye.
Executive: Mam wo aapke yaha na kisi video meeting ki request open hui thi to aap hi ne ki thi kya?
Customer: Kaunsi request?
Executive: Video meeting ke liye video meeting karne ke liye.
Customer: Ye kab ki baat hai?
Executive: Ye hui hai Saturday ko.
Customer: Actually main chutti pe hu Saturday.
Executive: Ho sakta hai ki by mam se baat hui mam bol rahi hai maine nahi ki hai. To ho sakta hai to
Customer: Saturday ko main chutti pe hu Saturday. To dekhna padega main chutti pe hu main office me hu nahi.
Executive: Ho sakta hai ki by mistake kisi se click ho gaya ho.
Customer: Ji ji ji ha.
Executive: To main isko close kar deta hu. Ah mam bol rahi thi ki aap se theek hai aapke pass mera number hai hi hai agar koi issue aata hai to aap mujhe call kar lijiyega. Theek hai?
Customer: Ye aap hi ka number hai? Dusra number hai na?
Executive: Ye official number hai aur aap us number pe bhi karenge to call lag jayega.
Customer: Okay. Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai na? Theek hai. Ek feedback aayega to please positive dijiyega.
Customer: To abhi to main office me nahi hu to kaise hoga feedback?
Executive: Kitne baje pahuchenge aap?
Customer: Aaj main nahi pahunch paungi aaj chutti pe hu.
Executive: To mobile mein aapke mobile mein open hai aapke?
Customer: Nahi nahi mobile mein nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai to aap kal pahunchiyega to kal hum se baat karenge.
Customer: Ji ji theek hai. Okay.
Executive: Okay mam thank you.
Customer: Thank you. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Video meeting request was opened from customer end.

Resolution:

- Executive closed the video meeting request.
- Executive provided his official number for future issues.

Next Steps: 

- Customer will provide feedback later.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, request, feedback, official number
